mapper.select: select business_id, business_email, business_password, business_ceo_name, business_number, business_company_name, business_phone_number, business_establishment_date, business_img_original_name, business_img_uuid, business_img_path, business_location, business_category from tbl_business where business_id = #{businessId}
select round(avg(review_grade),1) from tbl_business_review r join (select board_business_id from tbl_board_business where business_id = #{businessId}) t on r.board_business_id = t.board_business_id
select count(review_id) from tbl_business_review r join (select board_business_id from tbl_board_business where business_id = #{businessId}) t on r.board_business_id = t.board_business_id
